summary: Power of Fus in an arrow.
descriptionHtml:
Harness you\'r thu\'um in an arrow!

To craft them you use a forge, scroll to the bottom option called \"misc\" and then you have to option to craft a \"fus glass arrow\". It requires 1 iron arrow to make 50 arrows 

Upon the arrow impacting with anything it causes the unrelenting force effect to fire at the point the arrow hits.

At this stage its just a Proof Of Concept bit of fun
author: Davig019
